name: Alanna - The princess of puzzles (Early access)
name_original: Alanna - The princess of puzzles (Early access)
description:
Alanna - the princess of puzzles

Help Alanna to defeat all the monsters in the castle of shadows, level up system, inventory, potions, a lot of monsters a retro pixel style platformer.

Enjoy this awesome game full of monsters, pixel art based, with excellent music, 4 bosses and 20 levels to explore the castle, use swords and bows, get familiars, a lot of items, and solve different puzzles to go to the next area.

You can also get it here
